quotes.q: The only difference betwen ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.q: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it is the ability to deal with them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.q: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.q: If you want to master a habit, the key is to start with repitition, not perfection.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.q: Your friendship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have.
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.q: Your own self-realization is the greatest service you can render the world.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.q: There is hope in people, not in society, not in systems, but in you and me.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.q: Hope begins in the dark.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.q: The energy of the mind is the essense of life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.q: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.q: Don't go through life, grow through life.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.q: Your goal is not to battle with the mind, but to witness the mind.
quotes.author: Swami Muktananda

quotes.q: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.q: There are some things you learn best in calm and some in storm
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.q: Trust is not built in big, sweeping moments, It's built in tiney moments every day
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.q: Never lose track of the horizon, even if in this moment you are not seeing it
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.q: You wanna fly, you got to give up the thing that weighs you down.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.q: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.q: Sometimes in the waves of change, we find our true direction
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.q: Embrace the glorius mess that you are.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.q: Love is the water of life, jump into this water.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.q: Happiness is the highest good
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.q: Let your dream devour your life, not your life devour your dream
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.q: Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you act
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.q: In meditation, be like the cat purring
quotes.author: Tai Sheridan

quotes.q: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.q: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.q: You cannot build a deep connection with someone who is disconnected from themselves.
quotes.author: Yung Pueblo

quotes.q: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.q: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.q: The secret of happiness is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.q: There are two tragedies in life. One is not to get your heart's desire. The other is to get it.
quotes.author: Lalah Delia

quotes.q: Never confuse movement with action
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.q: The richest soil, if uncultivated, produces the rankest weed.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.q: Remember: a sign of growth is being okay with not being okay.
quotes.author: Yung Pueblo

quotes.q: The flame that burns twice as bright burns half as long.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.q: Be patient where you sit in the dark. The dawn is coming.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.q: Nature doesn't hurry, yet it accomplishes everything
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.q: The butterfly count not the months but moments, and has time enough.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.q: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.q: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.q: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking.
quotes.author: J.C. Watts

quotes.q: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.q: You are never too small to make a difference.
quotes.author: Greta Thurnberg

quotes.q: Proper listening is the foundation of proper living.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.q: Nothing haunts us like the things we don't say.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.q: Happiness lies not in finding what is missing, but in finding what is present.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.q: Her own thoughts and reflections were habitually her best companions.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.q: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.q: Who you are surrounded by often determines who you become.
quotes.author: Vicky Saunders

quotes.q: Once you carry your own water, you will learn the value of every drop.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.q: I am rooted but I flow.
quotes.author: Virginia Wolf

quotes.q: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.q: Got into yourself and see how deep the place is from which your life grows.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.q: Knowing oneself comes from attending with compassionate curiosity to what is happening within.
quotes.author: Gabor Mate
